Reviews.Title: It's ok
Reviews.Author: MARIAN E. HENDREN
Reviews.Content: The time display is very small which makes it extremely hard to read.  Wish it came with more of a regular watch band.

ProductInfo.Features:
Compatible with most of bluetooth mobiles
Bluetooth Profiles: supported Headset and Hands free profile
Stand-by time: 60 hours // Frequency range: 2.4 GHz
Can be charged by laptop or home PC via the USB cable provided, or the bundled AC adapter
Primary Function: Bluetooth bracelet with Time showing function and LCD display
ProductInfo.Name: KingMansion Bluetooth Bracelet with Vibration Function and Digital Time Display for Cell Phone - Silver
